author: rootsid
title: Cardano SSI standards contributors
description: There is no Cardano/Prism/Catalyst open source identity project contributing to SSI standards interop/portability discussions except RootsID

author: essbante
title: WAL-CLI Communication
description: The communication protocol required to enable interaction between RootsWallet wallets and WAL-CLI instances needs to be implemented.

author: michiel
title: Control your data - PRISM (Profila)
description: Today, companies have your data and (mis)use it for their benefit. People should control the use of their personal data and benefit from it.

author: fhilip.k
title: cAuth (SSI & oAuth) by AIM
description: Community projects need secure and easy to use authentication. Current auth. systems are centralised and often create "password hell"

author: elementarysoftware
title: Standard SSI templates library
description: There are no standards for which properties a digital credential must contain. Without standards, verification will be impossible

author: danbonfil
title: DID Community Trust Registry
description: SSI initiatives can identify the trust triangle but often lack the governance authority or trust registry to complete the trust diamond

author: fluxcap
title: Immigration Documents On Chain
description: Immigration documents at U.S. colleges and around the world are paper based creating issues paper based solutions have.

author: rodolfo.miranda
title: DIDComm v2 Mediator
description: Mobile identity wallets require a Mediator to communicate with other wallets and agents, but no Mediators are available based on DIDComm v2.

author: rodolfo.miranda
title: KYC Credentials PoC
description: How can SSI technology help streamline the process of KYC verification so more business can comply with regulations?

author: allisonfromm
title: Promote PRISM in Switzerland
description: Crypto-friendly countries are already implementing SSI, but using existing solutions such as Hyperledger Indy, Sovrin, and Kilt (Polkadot).

author: rootsid
title: RootsWallet - Support for sidetree
description: RootsWallet, that initially supports Prism DIDs, needs to support as many DID methods as possible to reach global interoperability

author: ditcameroon
title: SSI through ancestral Africa lenses
description:
--

The notion of Identity is deeply ingrained in the initiatory journey of ancestral Africa communities. There is a need to explore it.

author: gabrielaxel
title: NEURALPRINT: Neural ID's & NFT's
description: Basic ID mechanisms, e.g. fingerprints/keys, are ill-suited for accelerating cybersecurity risks and dynamic complex environments.

author: udais
title: Traveller ID Ecosystem
description: Traveller info is siloed in multiple centralised websites and the user does not have any control over it.

author: chaux
title: Green Yoma - SSI SDG Marketplace
description: To measure, verify and incentivise SDG impact claims, we require scalable credential issuance and smart contract capabilities.

author: iandebeer
title: Bridge Atala and Sovrin -Indy/Aries
description: Cardano Atala is not interoperable with the Sovrin Network

author: submarine7
title: Trustworthy News
description: The digital news fragmentation allows unreliable parties to publish content making audiences less informed due to the lack of accountability

author: salen
title: DirectEd-Student Scholarship Portal
description: Many students in Africa do not have the means to realise their full potential. Donation services lack efficiency, transparency and security.

author: alexp7
title: DCorps - Digital company registry
description: Organizations cannot have a corresponding digital identity that can operate securely and safely in the Digital World.

author: yeepeekoo
title: NFT - Proof of Authenticity
description: How do you verify the origin, the legitimacy, and the rights associated with an NFT? If you cannot, why risk buying it? Only FOMO?

author: matty
title: The Workers Protocol (WP)
description: Factory workers are faceless. While the quantification of their added value exists, their individuality disappears behind the statistics.

author: proofspace.nick
title: Trust Registry with Smart Contract
description: Creating and maintaining trust registries is a complex, time-consuming and costly exercise

author: proofspace.nick
title: Credential-based token, e.g. KYC
description: Digital KYC repeated for each new user onboarding results in a valuable identity asset that is underutilized.

author: jeffrey.downard
title: Disability, Accessibility & Equity
description: Individuals with disabilities face many challenges and barriers. How can Cardano resources help support rights to equal access?

author: moors
title: The Power of Sovereignty at Birth
description: Government issued birth documentation limits a newborns potential

author: captivatingnaturals
title: SSI for Coffee in East Africa
description: Coffee production helps middlemen and end users more than farmers and producers, leaving East African Coffee growers poor/disenfranchised.

author: dao.coders
title: DAO-NET: Sybil Defense by ZKP
description: Self Sovereign Identity solutions require a zero knowledge proof defense against Sybil attacks.

author: bsandmann
title: Trusted endorsements for the web
description: Distinguishing trustworthy websites and projects from shady ones is a challenge - especially in crypto. Fake reviews and BS is everywhere.
